sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Box, Button } from 'react-bulma-components'; function Search() { const { Input, Field, Control, Label, FieldLabel, FieldBody, Select } = Form const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ tags: "", sort: "pop", releaseType: "CD", depth: 1 }) const handleInput = (e) => { const keyName = e.target.name const keyVal = e.target.value setInputs({keyName: keyVal}) } return (
{inputs.tags} {/* Genres field */} {/* Depth field */} {/* Sort field */} {/* Type field */} {/* Submit field */}
) } export default Search
